title: Kwaidan: Ghost Stories and Strange Tales of Old Japan
description:
Kwaidan: Ghost Stories and Strange Tales of Old Japan (Dover Books on Literature & Drama) 
by Lafcadio Hearn  (Author) , Yasumasa Fujita (Illustrator) , Oscar Lewis (Introduction)

During the latter half of the 19th century, American journalist Lafcadio Hearn became our nation's great interpreter of all things Japanese. His superb translation of 20 supernatural tales teems with undead samurais, man-eating goblins, and other terrifying demons. These classic ghost stories inspired the OscarÃ‚Â®-nominated 1964 film of the same name. 22 illustrations.
